description: Removes a member from a channel's ban list.

parameters.name: ChannelArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the channel from which the AppInstanceUser was banned.

parameters.name: MemberArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser that you want to reinstate.

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.
